Air Force Doctrine Note 25-1, Artificial Intelligence

This document provides an overview of artificial intelligence (AI) and its applications in the Air Force, discussing the promise and risks of AI, as well as considerations for employment.

Key Concepts:

  • AI Overview
  • Human-Machine Teaming
  • Air Force Core Functions
  • Deep learning
  • Pattern recognition
  • Data-driven decision making
